desc: 通常攻撃・クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージを増加＆スパーク時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加＆攻撃力・防御力を２０％アップ

dictionary.lore: A special Sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab, Noel. The Steel Orb was made from a highly explosive material found in the Vortex. And similar to its fiery nature, this Sphere boosts offensive abilities in battle. Although Noel was satisfied with the final product, he decided to continue exploring the properties of this Sphere's substance in hopes of eventually combining it with something else.

name: 煉導器・オルガンテ
